title: Heroes.Season.1.&.2.By.CGAR
description:
Heroes Season 1 & 2 By CGAR



INFO

Release:........> Heroes Season 1 & 2

Video Type:.....> 33 AVI Files & 1 MKV

Language:.......> English


Description

This is all of heroes (so Far - as of this torrents release - JUNE 2008)



Extra INFO

The first file in season 2 is an .MKV file so you'll need an mkv file splitter - Jetaudio, Media player classic e.t.c.

If you want media player classic, get The CCCP Project (Combined Community Codec Pack). this is what i use as its great quality.

an .NFO file viewer is included so you can read the nfo file correctly
